title: Insider: 10 Questions for Pogačar’s Tour de France Performance Coach
content:
Tadej Pogačar holds a commanding lead in the 2021 Tour de France in the final week of racing, and winning again would give him two consecutive victories in the biggest road cycling race in the world. Pogačar rides for the UAE Team Emirates squad, and as a team at the pinnacle of pro cycling, they […]

author: Seiji Ishii
